bugger.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an offensive word for someone who is very annoying or unpleasant
bugger.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone that you pretend to be annoyed with, although you actually like or love them
bugger.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The poor little bugger got an awful shock.
bugger.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a job or activity that is very difficult
bugger.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The exam was a bit of a bugger.
bugger.translation[1].definitions[0].def: said when you are annoyed or angry
